檽字的基本解释

檽
nòu
古书上说的一种树：“今者京师贵戚，（棺）必欲江南檽梓豫章之木。”

檽
ruǎn
黑枣。
木耳：“今世用芝，此是树木枝上所生，状如木檽。”

檽
rú
梁上短柱。

檽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nòu］
［《集韻》乃豆切，去候，泥。］
亦作“1”。
(1)木名。
(2)见“櫢檽”。
[②]［ruǎn］
［《集韻》乳兖切，上，日。］
［《廣韻》人之切，平之，日。］
(1)果木名。参见“檽2棗”。
(2)同“”。木耳。

檽字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檽； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页559第03
【集韻】【韻會】乃豆切，音耨。構檽，木皮可染紫。【後漢·濳夫論】江南檽梓，以爲棺椁。　又【集韻】乃后切，音㪍。又尼主切，音醹。義?同。　又【集韻】人之切，音而。又乳兗切，音軟。詳栭㮕註。

檽字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檽字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树；还指黑枣或木耳。

檽
Basic explanation of words
檽
nòu
A kind of tree said in ancient books: "Today's capital is noble, and (coffin) must be the tree of Jiangnan Tongziyu Zhang."
檽
ruǎn
Black dates.
Fungus: "Mushrooms are used in this world. They are grown on the branches of trees and resemble wooden pimples."
檽
rú
Short column on the beam.
檽
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nòu］
["Jiyun" is to cut beans, wait for them, and mud. ]
Also called "1".
(1) Wooden name.
(2) See "櫢檽".
[②]［ruǎn］
["Jiyun" breast cut, upper , day. ]
["Guangyun" cut, peace, day. ]
(1) The name of the fruit tree. See "檽2 Jujube".
(2) Same as "". Fungus.
檽
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檽; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 559 03
【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】Naidou cut with sound. The veneer can be dyed purple. [Latter Han·Yifu Theory] Jiangnan Yunzi, thought of the coffin.　[Jiyun] is the back cut, sound 㪍. And Nizhu cut, the sound ji. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] The cut of people, the sound. The breasts are cut again, and the sound is soft. Note for details.
檽

Hong Kong Mingti
Japanese Ming Dynasty

Old glyph
檽
Name meaning
A tree mentioned in ancient books; also refers to black dates or fungus.
nòu, ruǎn, rú
1) nòu 古书上说的一种树：“今者京师贵戚，（棺）必欲江南檽梓豫章之木”
2) ruǎn
а) 黑枣
б) 木耳：“今世用芝，此是树木枝上所生，状如木檽”
3) rú 梁上短柱
